Robert Crook

  1. Alternate Birth Name: [Robbie]
  2. Foster Name:
  3. Foster Family: Joe McClain
  4. Location of Family: Hendley, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  6. Arrival Place: Orleans, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 7
  8. Date of Birth: 1877-04-10
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: Patricia J. Young and Frances E. Marks, Tears on Paper: The History and Life Stories of the Orphan Train Riders (n.p., 1990), p. 165-167.
